title: Indiana Firm Recalls Ready-To-Eat Pizza Stick Products Produced Without Benefit of Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, March 2, 2012 - Pasou Foods, a Syracuse, Ind. establishment, is recalling approximately 147 pounds of frozen, fully cooked, ready-to-eat pizza stick products because a meat ingredient used in the product may have been produced without the benefit of federal inspection, the U.S. Department...
